shinysurveyjs 0.1.0

Create Survey UI with CSS and Message Components

survey_ui.Rd

Builds the UI components for a SurveyJS-based survey, including CSS styling, message panels, and data display elements.

Usage

survey_ui(id, theme, primary, mode, cookie_expiration_days, custom_css)

Arguments

id

String. HTML ID for the survey container div. Default: "surveyContainer".

theme

String. SurveyJS theme, either "defaultV2" or "modern". Default: "defaultV2".

primary

String. Hex color code for primary theme customization.

mode

String. Color mode, either "light" or "dark". Default: "light".

cookie_expiration_days

Numeric. Number of days to retain survey cookies. Default: 7.

custom_css

String. Custom CSS rules to append to the theme.

Value

A tagList containing survey dependencies, container div, message panels, and optional data display components.
